message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's better to settle now than lose value later.
I think we can both do better.  Let's split it more evenly. I'll take 55, you take 45.  This way we both get a fair share and avoid too much loss from inflation.
Bob, this is the best you'll get.  My turn to propose a more even split.  Take it before inflation eats away at your gains even more!
